participant_1.background:
I value my health and well-being more than anything else.
music has always been my number one passion.
he taught me right from wrong.
My hands were always greasy from working on cars.
My biggest challenge was accepting that my whining was getting in the way of my relationships.

participant_2.background:
I'm looking for a home that is close to a tennis court so I can continue to play my favorite sport.
i am a viking.
i want to get married again.
i can t get enough of rap music , it s so good.
I took medication to help with my dust allergy so I could write my book.

content.text: Hey there! I am doing well. Thanks for asking!
That is great to hear!  What are your interests?
I am a huge fan of rap music.  I also love to play tennis and write books!
That is awesome! I love to listen to rap music as well.  I also enjoy writing books, but I am not very good at it!
It takes a lot of time and practice to become a good writer.  I am sure you will get better with time!
Thank you!  I am trying to get better.  I am also looking for a home that is close to a tennis court so I can continue to play my favorite sport.
That sounds like a great idea!  I am sure you will find a great home soon.
I hope so!  What are your plans for the future?
I am hoping to get married again and have a family one day.  I also want to continue writing books and playing tennis.
Those are all great goals!  I am sure you will achieve them all.
Thank you!  I am working hard to make them happen!
